settings.title: M-Technology
settings.subheading: THE MOST ADVANCED MATERIALS WITH A DASH OF MAD SCIENCE

settings.title: Lens Geometry
settings.content: The optical design of the base curve lens is AI enhanced 3-axis optical correction for prismatic power.  This is coupled with custom blended optical grade materials for ultimate clarity and reduced internal haze, along with Thermo Carbon impact resistance for eye protection.

settings.title: PLASMACHROMATIC
settings.content: Multi-layer coatings using an assortment of exotic materials.  These precision coatings reflect light, reducing glare and eye strain.

settings.title: EYE FENCE
settings.content: Thermo Carbon backed impact resistant lenses protect your eyes from flying debris, UV rays, and other hazards.

settings.title: RES+
settings.content: Ultra-definition optical clarity reduces distortion and offers a wide field of view, creating a superior optical experience.

settings.title: POLARIZED
settings.content: High-performance polarized lenses block 99.9% of reflective glare for the most vivid and detailed visual experiences.

settings.title: DAUL CHAMBER INFUSION
settings.content: A multi-stage mold process using fiberglass reinforced TR90 substrate parts in Gigawatt, resulting in a stiff chassis in and around the hinge while maintaining flexibility and skin feel in the nose and ear areas for comfort.

settings.title: LENS CLUTCH
settings.content: Lens quick release system giving you the fastest, most secure method to switch lenses.

settings.title: RATCHETING NOSE PIECE
settings.content: Adjustable nose piece system designed for different nose sizes and provides a secure, non-slip fit.

settings.title: SLICS
settings.content: Ear pads engineered with Atomic 14 providing maximum comfort and non-slip grip.

settings.title: M Carbon
settings.content: Semitransparent polyamide proprietary frame material provides superior heat resistance and durability, in addition to exceptional strength and crack resistance.

settings.title: Atomic 13
settings.content: Carefully selected lightweight blend of Aluminum used in our M Icons.  Each is precisely blended providing toughness, lightness, and strength.

settings.title: Thermo Carbon
settings.content: Lens material consisting of submicroscopic polymer chains delivers proven impact resistance, maximum optical clarity, and superior lens durability.

settings.title: ATOMIC 14
settings.content: Silicone polymer material used in our Slics, delivering a high comfort, non-slip grip capable of anchoring your eyewear to your face with maximum comfort.

custom_css: h3 {text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 26px; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-family: "Helvetica Neue Thin", var(--text-font-family);}
@media screen and (min-width: 750px) {h3 {text-align: left; font-size: 32px; font-weight: 300; margin-bottom: 1rem; }}

settings.title: Gigawatt
settings.content:
Lens Technology

  • Lens Geometry: AI assisted 3 axis correction for prismatic distortion and refractive power.
  • Plasmachromatic: Precision coatings reflect light, reducing glare and eye strain.
  • Polarized: High-performance coating blocking 99.9% of reflective glare.
  • Eye Fence: Impact resistance for maximum eye protection.
  • Res+: Ultra-definition optical clarity reducing distortion while offering a wider field of view.

Materials

  • M Carbon: Proprietary frame material providing superior heat resistance and durability.
  • Thermo Carbon: Delivers proven impact resistance, maximum optical clarity and durability.
  • Atomic 14: Smooth silicone delivering high comfort and non-slip grip.

settings.content:
Lens Technology

  • Lens Geometry: Ai assisted 3 axis correction for prismatic distortion and refractive power.
  • Plasma (Plasmachromatic): Precision coatings reflect light, reducing glare and eye strain.
  • Polarized: High- performance coating blocking 99.9% of reflective glare.
  • Eye Fence: Impact resistance for maximum eye protection.
  • Res+: Ultra-Definition optical clarity reducing distortion while offering a wider field of view.

Materials

  • M Carbon: Proprietary frame material providing superior heat resistance and durability.
  • Atomic 13: Blended Aluminum used for toughness, lightness, and strength.
  • Thermo Carbon: Delivers proven impact resistance, maximum optical clarity and durability.
